title.rendered: Smile Foundation Partners With IIT-Kanpur For ‘Techkriti ’21’ To Create Awareness On Shiksha Na Ruke Campaign

content.rendered: To support – #ShikshaNaRuke, Techkriti – IIT Kanpur, in association with Smile Foundation, organised a drawing competition titled “What’s your dream?”, where children were asked to sketch their dreams on the canvas of their creativity.
